item.title: Grammar schools are not the answer
item.author: Felix Editor,Husain Al-Jabir,Hussain Al-Jabir,
item.description: Disclaimer: I’m an alumnus of a well-known North London grammar school, having joined in the sixth form from a high achieving comprehensive school. I’ve studied under both school systems, coming out the other side with insights into each. No-one could accuse me of not being qualified enough to speak …
